PropertyValue.Value: SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.file_type, t.file_name, t.up_date, t.up_time, t.up_num, t.up_result, bt.file_type_name, case t.up_result when '0' then '成功' when '1' then '失败' when '2' then '检查失败' when '3' then '未处理' else '未知' end AS status_name FROM data_file_up_info t LEFT JOIN basi_file_type_info bt ON t.file_type = bt.file_type AND t.file_sub_type = bt.file_sub_type) as ttt
